name: DDSP
short_description:
DDSP is a CMS, which already has about 10 sites running on it. The main purpose for pushing it to the open source community is to give it a potential for growth with help of patches and plug-ins developed by the community.

It is based on PHP and uses pretty much of PHP object-oriented instruments. It supports ajax calls, unique UI-themes for each site, a role model for user permissions, a system of user levels (as a benefit for active users etc.), a system of raiting for content, counters of views and comments, a set of block and content layouts (which can be easely supplemented), about 20 types of blocks (latest comments, social networks widgets, tags, menus, content from another section etc.), about 25 field types for content (short text, WYSIWYG text, audio, images, video from youtube, tags, markers for Google map etc.) and some other capabilities.
summary: DDSP is a php-based CMS, which already has stable releases
